pullRequest.title: [MO] - [system tests] -> cruise control api tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: morsak xorsak02@stud.fit.vutbr.cz
Type of change

Enhancement / new feature

Description
This PR adding few tests for cruise control endpoints which are:

STATE
REBALANCE
STOP_PROPOSAL_EXECUTION
USER_TASKS

Checklist

 Write tests
 Make sure all tests pass

commit.message:
[MO] - [system test] -> cruise control api tests

Signed-off-by: morsak <xorsak02@stud.fit.vutbr.cz>

nodes.bodyText: So these endpoints are already defined in the cluster-operator module. I know we decided against putting the cc client stuff in operator-common but preventing duplicate code like this might be a good argument for moving it. Particularly if the endpoints need to be updated in future.
Maybe you can use better name for this method? Something like callApi ? But it's just a suggestion
it's not an endpoint on its own, should we call it CRUISE_CONTROL_BASE_ENDPOINT or maybe better CRUISE_CONTROL_ENDPOINT_BASE? @tomncooper wdyt? Or using ROOT instead of BASE ...
